hero.title: DYKESWHOTECH
description: Our community grows thanks to the passion and time of volunteers. However, to keep producing high-quality events, investing in great content, and creating meaningful connections, we need your support. Every donation helps us ensure our community remains independent, strong, and accessible to everyone.

items.title: Event Production
items.text: Covering logistics for the Dykeathon, Drink & Dyke, and our meetups (venue, equipment, refreshments, and everything else we need to make it happen).

items.title: A Safe & Inclusive Space
items.text: Funding the tools and platforms that allow us to manage the community and keep it a safe, professional environment.

items.title: Community Growth
items.text: Expanding our reach to connect more women and create more opportunities for professional and social impact.
